nodes.text: OT-3PO was a 3PO-series protocol droid who worked in a flophouse located in Gnawer's Roost in the sub-levels of Coruscant. On one occasion, members of the Alderaanian Resistance came by in search of the technician Pavel Trenol, who was staying in a room there. OT-3PO demanded a fee in return for telling them what room Trenol was staying in.

He was gray in color and was very rusty, covered in grime and had graffiti on him. He was also chained to the floor, something that he disliked as he couldn't understand why he wasn't trusted. However, he was very untrustworthy and would do anything for a few credits. He was programmed to speak Basic, Binary, Bocce, Huttese and Ryl.
